Test¶

class extremals.Test(keys=None, function=None, args=[], normalized=False, name=None)[source]¶

Bases: object

This class implements the idea of a test to run on a dataframe. The output, returned via Test.Apply, is a sorted series.

Parameters:
  • keys (list) – list of columns to use, default None: all columns used
  • function (function) – function, default None
  • args (list) – list of optional arguments for function, default empty
  • normalized (bool) – If True, the resulting series will be normalized (see Normalize), default False
  • name (str) – name of the output series, default None

The attribute function takes a list as input: if l is the length of keys, such list is divided into two parts: the first l elements will be the values of a row of some dataframe, the others are the elements of args.

Alternatively, one can change the methods Test.GetArgs and Test.GetValue and ignore the attributes function and args.

Examples: we consider the dataframe data

test = xt.Test(function = lambda x : (x[1]-x[2])**2/x[0], name = 'custom' )

function is some random function. keys not specified means that all columns will be used

result = test.Apply(data)

# result is the series
f    1.562500e+02
b    1.587600e+02
g    4.455000e+02
a    3.333333e+03
c    1.201216e+04
l             inf # A division by zero warning is raised
Name: custom, dtype: float64

Columns d,e,h,i are discarded and the series is sorted

test = xt.Test(function = lambda x : sum(x), name='Sum', normalized = True)
result = test.Apply(data)

# result is the (normalized) series
l   -0.762235
c   -0.168376
f   -0.005086
a    0.176427
g    0.190890
b    0.568380
Name: Sum, dtype: float64

Methods Summary

Apply(data[, sort]) Creates and returns a new pandas series obtained applying self.function on the values of dataframe data corresponding to the columns listed in self.keys.
GetArgs(data) Loads the optional arguments self.args or any other data needed.
GetValue(arr) Return self.function applied on the list arr+self.args

Methods Documentation

Apply(data, sort=True)[source]¶

Creates and returns a new pandas series obtained applying self.function on the values of dataframe data corresponding to the columns listed in self.keys.

Parameters:
  • data (pandas.DataFrame) – dataframe
  • sort (bool) – if True the resulting series is sorted, default True
Return type:

pandas.Series with name self.name

Loads the optional arguments self.args or any other data needed.

GetValue(arr)[source]¶

Return self.function applied on the list arr+self.args

Parameters:arr (list) – this will be a list of values of a row in a dataframe
